Package edu.cs2430.assignment3

Class CoursePlanningSystem

java.lang.Object
edu.cs2430.assignment3.CoursePlanningSystem
public class CoursePlanningSystem extends Object
The course planning system will hold an array (maximum size of 1000) for students, courses, and schedules
This system will allow for adding, removing, and retrieving students, courses, and schedules for students

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final int
    ARRAY_MAX
    A constant to represent the maximum size (1000) of all three arrays (students, courses, and schedules)
    private int
    courseIndex
    The current index for the array of courses
    This is required to keep track of where to insert the next course in the array.
    private Course[]
    courses
    An array to store the courses in the system
    private int
    scheduleIndex
    The current index for the array of course
    This is required to keep track of where to insert the next course in the array.
    private Schedule[]
    schedules
    An array to store the schedules in the system
    private int
    studentIndex
    The current index for the array of students
    This is required to keep track of where to insert the next student in the array.
    private Student[]
    students
    An array to store the students in the system

  • Constructor Details

    • CoursePlanningSystem

      public CoursePlanningSystem()
      Default constructor for the course planning system. Initializes all array indices to zero and initializes all arrays based on ARRAY_MAX

  • Method Details

    • getStudents

      public Student[] getStudents()
      Returns the array of students
      Returns:
      Returns the array of students

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent(int studentId)
      Searches the array of students for the student with the given id and returns the student
      Parameters:
      studentId - The id of the student
      Returns:
      Returns the student or null if the student could not be found

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent(Student student)
      Adds a student to the end of the student array. If the array cannot store any more students, then the student is not added and "false" is returned.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be added
      Returns:
      Returns true if the student could be added, false if the student could not be added

    • removeStudent

      public boolean removeStudent(int studentId)
      Attempts to remove the student (specified by the studentId) from the array
      If the student could not be found, "false" is returned
      If there are any schedules for the student, those schedules are not affected (for assignment simplicity)
      Parameters:
      studentId - The student id
      Returns:
      Returns true if the student was removed, false the student was not removed

    • removeStudentEntry

      private void removeStudentEntry(int index)
      Removes a student (specified by the index) from the array
      Shifts all other students down in the array such that there are no null elements in the middle.
      If there are any schedules for the student, those schedules are not affected (for assignment simplicity)
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the student to remove

    • getCourses

      public Course[] getCourses()
      Returns the array of courses
      Returns:
      Returns the array of courses

    • getCourse

      public Course getCourse(int courseNumber, Program program)
      Searches the array of courses for the course with the given course number and program and returns the course
      Parameters:
      courseNumber - The course number
      program - The program the course belongs to
      Returns:
      Returns the course or null if the course could not be found

    • addCourse

      public boolean addCourse(Course course)
      Adds a course to the end of the course array. If the array cannot store any more courses, then the course is not added and "false" is returned.
      Parameters:
      course - The course to be added
      Returns:
      Returns true if the course was added, false if the course could not be added

    • removeCourse

      public boolean removeCourse(int courseNumber, Program program)
      Attempts to remove the course (specified by the course number) from the array.
      If the course could not be found, "false" is returned
      If there are any schedules referencing the course, those schedules are not affected (for assignment simplicity)
      Parameters:
      courseNumber - The course number
      program - The program the course is in
      Returns:
      Returns true if the course was removed, false if the course was not removed

    • removeCourseEntry

      private void removeCourseEntry(int index)
      Removes a course (specified by the index) from the course array.
      Shifts all other courses down in the array such that there are no null elements in the middle.
      If there are any schedules for the course, those schedules are not affected (for assignment simplicity)
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the course to remove

    • getSchedulesByStudentId

      public Schedule[] getSchedulesByStudentId(int studentId)
      Searches the schedule array and returns all schedules for the student specified by the student id.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The student id
      Returns:
      Returns an array of all schedules the student has

    • getScheduleByUuid

      public Schedule getScheduleByUuid(UUID uuid)
      Searches the array of schedule and returns the schedule specified by the uuid
      Parameters:
      uuid - The uuid of the schedule
      Returns:
      Returns the schedule or null if the schedule could not be found

    • addSchedule

      public boolean addSchedule(Schedule schedule)
      Adds a schedule to the end of the schedule array. If the array cannot store any more schedules then the schedule is not added and "false" is returned.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The schedule to be added
      Returns:
      Returns true if the schedule could be added, false if the schedule could not be added

    • removeSchedule

      public boolean removeSchedule(UUID uuid)
      Attempts to remove the schedule (specified by the schedule UUID) from the array.
      Shifts all other schedules down in the array such that there are no null elements in the middle.
      If the schedule could not be found, "false" is returned
      Parameters:
      uuid - The unique identifier for the schedule
      Returns:
      Returns true if the schedule was removed, false if the course was not removed

    • removeSchedule

      private void removeSchedule(int index)
      Removes a schedule (specified by the index) from the schedule array.
      Shifts all other schedules down in the array such that there are no null elements in the middle.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the schedule to remove

    • addScheduleEntryByScheduleUuid

      public boolean addScheduleEntryByScheduleUuid(UUID scheduleUuid, ScheduleEntry scheduleEntry)
      Adds a schedule entry to the schedule specified by the schedule uuid. If the array cannot store any more schedule entries
      then the schedule entry is not added and "false" is returned.
      Parameters:
      scheduleUuid - The uuid of the schedule
      scheduleEntry - The schedule entry to add to the schedule
      Returns:
      Returns true if the schedule entry could be added, false if the schedule entry could not be added

    • removeScheduleEntryByScheduleUuid

      public boolean removeScheduleEntryByScheduleUuid(UUID scheduleUuid, ScheduleEntry scheduleEntry)
      Removes the schedule entry from the array.
      Searches for the schedule using the scheduleUuid and attempts to remove the schedule entry from the schedule.
      Parameters:
      scheduleUuid - The uuid of the schedule
      scheduleEntry - The schedule entry to remove from the schedule
      Returns:
      Returns true if the schedule entry was removed from the schedule, false if the schedule entry was not removed from the schedule
